Bio

I am a creative Front-End Web Developer who likes to create web pages with an organized structure. A well-organized person and a problem solver with high attention to detail.

My IT journey started a few years ago when I decided to dedicate myself to coding. Since then, the desire to learn new technologies has only grown.

So far, I have built a couple of small projects, and I started to build one e-commerce site from scratch witch is in progress.

You can see some of my work in the section "My projects". I am interested in the entire frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.
